about.title: About me
about.p1: I'm a motivated computer science student, always ready to take on new challenges and learn new things. I've worked on a variety of projects which helped me strengthen both my technical skills and ability to work in teams, even under pressure.
about.p2: I love web and software development and continually explore new technologies to stay up to date. I also enjoy sharing knowledge so we can all get better together.
about.p3: I'm in the third year of the Epitech Grande École program and I'm always looking for opportunities to apply what I learn and contribute to interesting projects.
